nodes.text: The Bimm smuggler Rayc Ryjerd purchased a starship sometime before or during the year 4 ABY, putting himself into debt in the process. He worked for the Hutt crime lord Jabba Desilijic Tiure in an effort to pay these debts.
The starship was briefly mentioned on the Star Wars Customizable Card Game card for Rayc Ryjerd in the 1998 Jabba's Palace Limited expansion.
